document.full_text: mark teixeira was forced to leave after being hit by a pitch in the first inning, and freddy garcia's start lasted only an inning and two-thirds.
document.title: red sox 6, yankees 4: yankees are doomed by two early exits
lines_and_colors: mark teixeira was forced to leave after being hit by a pitch in the first inning, and freddy garcia's start lasted only an inning and two-thirds.
